article_title: Boil Advisory After Water Main Break - Story
article_text:
MOUNTAIN VIEW, Mo. -- People who live in Mountain View, Missouri are being urged to boil their cooking and drinking water, after a break in the town's water main.

The city's water department says the break happened on a 10-inch line on Tom Frommel Drive.

People on city water are being told to boil their water as a precaution until further notice.
